title: Find a Cure
tags: how to unlock find a cure
content:
nturers on their expedition. She then says she'll see what she can do. Your next set of choices will look like this:

Thank you, I'll take anything that can help. What's that plant? Will it help? Just hurry up and cure me. I don't have time to chat.

If you choose the first option, she'll ask you about what's happened so far and if there are any symptoms. Your next set of choices will look like this:

I can merge my mind with anyone else that's infected. I fell from a ship in the sky, but someth
